title: GBPUAT Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in interview for 32 Assistant Professor Posts
description: The Gobind Ballabh Pant University of Agriculture and Technology (GBPUAT) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 32 Assistant Professor Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed theirÂ B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M.
